amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: Sec.___. The total amount of appropriations made available by this Act is hereby reduced by $1,700,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the total amount of appropriations made available by this bill by $1,700,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 91 - 328 (Roll no. 484).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 91 - 328 (Roll no. 484).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Ms. Woolsey.
